scripts.prd:destroy: echo serverless remove --verbose --stage prd --region us-east-1 --aws-profile xentity
scripts.stg:destroy: echo serverless remove --verbose --stage stg --region us-east-1 --aws-profile xentity
scripts.local:downloadsource: cd downloadSource && pipenv run python local.py --event events/test01.json
scripts.stg:test:downloadsource: aws lambda invoke --function-name stg-downloadSource --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out --payload file://downloadSource/events/test01.json response.json --profile xentity
